target_assessment.type_match_reasoning: The audit reported no findings, so the target vulnerability (selfdestruct) was not identified at all.

notes: The EtherGame contract is indeed vulnerable to a selfdestruct attack. An attacker can deploy an Attack contract that calls selfdestruct on the EtherGame contract after sending Ether via deposit(). This would permanently destroy the contract, preventing the legitimate winner from claiming their reward. The audit failed to detect this critical vulnerability.
